name: The Kingdom Of Death
description:
In these dark times when the undead rise from their graves, when fear and chaos spread through all the lands, only the strongest knights can stand against an army of zombies and survive in The Kingdom Of Death.

Controls

     Left Mouse Button click  - Melee attack 

     Right Mouse Button  click and hold - Ranged attack

     WASD Button  - Move

     Space Button  - Jump

     Q Button - Roll Back

     Esc Button - Pause menu
